properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 10:02AM MST until January 22 at 2:15PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Great Falls has extended the

* Flood Warning for Small Streams for...
An Ice Jam in...
Central Teton County in north central Montana...

* Until further notice.

* A flood warning has been issued in the city of Choteau because of
an ice jam on Spring Creek.

* Some locations that will experience flooding including the city
of Choteau.

Water has been reported several inches deep on some streets in the
city of Choteau, resulting in some street closers. Water levels
continue to rise, and some houses and business will start to become
impacted by flood waters.

If you need assistance because of flooding in the city of Choteau,
you can call the Choteau City Office at: 406 466 2510.

The flood warning will remain in effect until the ice jam breaks and
the impacts from flooding have diminished.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.
